Package table

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • table.Table
  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object

    The poker table

    Handles the flop, turn and river. Keeps track on big and small blind and the dealer button. Keeps track of the players around the table.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Table()
      A no argument constructor.
      Table​(Players pPlayers)
      A parameterized constructor which populates the table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void dealCard()
      Deals the flop, the turn and the river to the table.
      Card getCardFromDeck()
      Returns the card at the top of the deck on the table.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      void moveBlinds()
      Move the big and small blind to the next players.
      void moveDealerButton()
      Move the dealer button to the next player.
      void populateTable​(Players pPlayers)
      Populating players to the poker table.
      void removeCardsFromTable()
      Remove the flop, turn and river from the table.
      Card[] showAllCards()
      Get the cards which are shown on the table.

      Get one of the cards on the table.

        A parameterized constructor which populates the table.

    • Method Detail

      • dealCard

        public void dealCard()
        Deals the flop, the turn and the river to the table.

      • showAllCards

        public Card[] showAllCards()
        Get the cards which are shown on the table.
        Returns:
        The all flopped cards.

      • showCard

        public Card showCard​(int index)
        Get one of the cards on the table.
        Parameters:
        index - Which one of the five cards (0 - 4) that will be returned.
        Returns:
        A flopped card.

      • moveBlinds

        public void moveBlinds()
        Move the big and small blind to the next players.

      • moveDealerButton

        public void moveDealerButton()
        Move the dealer button to the next player.

      • populateTable

        public void populateTable​(Players pPlayers)
        Populating players to the poker table.
        Parameters:
        pPlayers - The players participating in the poker game.

      • removeCardsFromTable

        public void removeCardsFromTable()
        Remove the flop, turn and river from the table. This is simulated by assigning all those cards to cards to null.

      • getCardFromDeck

        public Card getCardFromDeck()
        Returns the card at the top of the deck on the table.
        Returns:
        The card at the top of the deck on the table.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
